title: Complimentary NYC Walking Tour Event
seo_description: Explore Winter In New York City
short_description: With TriBeCa, Soho, and the Financial District at your front door, there are plenty TriBeCa attractions to see and do during your stay at the Cosmopolitan Hotel -TriBeCa.
more_content:
Explore Winter In New York City

Walk the streets like a true New Yorker this winter when you explore some of Manhattan’s best neighborhoods with Streetwise New York Tours. As a guest of Triumph Hotels, you can enjoy complimentary walking tours provided at the following hotels this winter. Please find our modified Winter Schedule running from January 12th– April 2nd, 2017 below:

All tours begin in front of the following locations:

Thursday-9:30 a.m.
Washington Jefferson Hotel - Hell's Kitchen
Discover the hidden gems of Times Square, its Theater District and the neighboring Hell's Kitchen.

Friday-9:30 a.m.
Cosmopolitan Hotel - TriBeCa
Explore the art and fashion near the Financial District and new Freedom Tower.

Sunday-10:30 a.m.
Iroquois New York - Midtown
Experience classic Midtown Manhattan at Bryant Park, Grand Central Station, and the New York Public Library.

Request a Reservation

Our full Walking Tours schedule will resume on April 4th, 2017, Tuesday through Sunday. Join us on April 7th, 2017 at 9:30 a.m., when Cosmopolitan Hotel - TriBeCa will resume offering complimentary NYC Walking tours every Friday to guests staying in our plush accommodations. Enjoy a morning stroll through one of the most classic neighborhoods in Manhattan with Streetwise Downtown Manhattan tour. Walk along SoHo shops and the iconic World Trade One tower. As a guest of Cosmopolitan Hotel – TriBeCa, you are also able to access the additional complimentary NYC walking tours available at the following Triumph Hotels

All reservation requests are accepted two weeks in advance to arrival and are based on availability. For more information, please contact the concierge or front desk at your hotel.
